meanings.definition: A Hungarian dish made with meat, onions, and paprika.
meanings.sent1: I tried the delicious paprikashes at the Hungarian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My grandma makes the best paprikashes for family dinners.
meanings.sent3: The paprikashes smelled so good that my stomach started growling.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the paprikashes filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The paprikashes were a burst of flavors in my mouth, leaving me wanting more.

meanings.definition: To cook or prepare a dish in the style of paprikashes.
meanings.sent1: I want to paprikashes a special dinner for my friends this weekend.
meanings.sent2: She paprikashes the chicken with care and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: He tried to paprikashes a new recipe but ended up burning the dish.
meanings.sent4: The chef paprikashes the meal to perfection, impressing all the guests.
meanings.sent5: Paprikashing requires patience and a good sense of seasoning to get it right.
